name: Quarterly Review
description: Reflect and review your quarter.A collection of digital and printable reflection journals to help you reflect quarter by quarter in Notion.How does it work?Review each quarter and reflect on it with the "Quarterly Review" printable template.Combine the printable planners with the printable reflection journal to routinely plan, track, review, and reflect on your entire year.What's included?Quarterly reviewWho will benefit from this?IndividualsProfessionalsAnyone who would like to review and refle
features: Review each quarter and reflect on it with the "Quarterly Review" printable template.; Combine the printable planners with the printable reflection journal to routinely plan, track, review, and reflect on your entire year.; Quarterly review; Individuals; Professionals; Anyone who would like to review and reflect on their performance; Absolutely. Just duplicate the template from the link after your purchase.; No worries! Contact me in my DMs:Twitter
